resources.string: BSC (Battery Stats Changer) is modern app to change battery stats with root access or Shizuku. All changed stats resets after reboot.
Setting values less than one may turn off your device.
After switching, the system will think that your device is charging.
Replaces the battery capacity calculated by the system with your value.
Setting the temperature to high values ​​may shut down your device.
Failed to check the functionality of your selected method.
❄️ Your battery information is frozen. To unfreeze it, you need to press the reset button!!!
there are no settings here yet <3
